details:
It was discovered that joblib did not properly sanitize arguments
to pre\_dispatch, allowing arbitrary code execution.


For Debian 10 buster, this problem has been fixed in version
0.13.0-2+deb10u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your joblib packages.


For the detailed security status of joblib please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/joblib>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
